page.title: 13Facilities and Recreation.
page.content: There are {Facilities} to help the { {Unemployed} in Heywood. There is a D.H.S.S. Benefit Office and a Job Centre in the town. There is also a Drop-in Centre, specifically for young people, with expert help available. It is situated just under the {Careers {Office} where more help is at hand. Although there are {Community Centres} in Heywood, at Darnhill and at Back O' the Moss,there are none in our block,except the Education and Training Centre at Hind Hill Street, the site of the Careers Office. There are few {Entertainment {Facilities} available in Heywood. Apart from the pubs, a few of which have discos, most people travel to Manchester, Bury or Rochdale. The town has fairly good {Sports Facilities, but,apart from the cricket team, all spectator sports are in Manchester.
